Question.Subject: my new OLYMPUS X940 DIGITAL CAMERA...?
Question.Content: hi everyone....just hav my hands on my new OLYMPUS X940 digital camera..wel,i always wanted 2 hav one by sony..but anyways,ended up having olympus X940 from my dad.......does any1 already has it?how has ur experience with it?is it a gud option for casual/formal functions photography?????wht abt its picture quality???is it comparable to sony products or not?? it has 14 mega pixel camera...n 4xwide optical zoom... ur answers and reviews wud be highly appreciated.......thanks!!!!!!!

ChosenAnswer: Olympus X-940 14 Megapixel Digital Camera has filters and can do all sorts of special effects. It is def worth more than the price. I am VERY satisfied. A good camera for the plain point and shoot.

Answers.Answer: My answer is that we don't to text speak here... we type in English. Get your English in order before writing here again please.
